en-US.summary: Daily Bible reading plan to read through the entire Bible
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Bible Reading what's today's reading
Alexa, ask Bible Reading for March fifteenth
Alexa, ask Bible Reading to mark today complete
en-US.name: M'Cheyne Bible Reading Plan
en-US.description: Get your daily Bible reading from the M'Cheyne reading plan. Choose from 1-year, 2-year, or 4-year plans to read through the entire Bible. Track your progress and never miss a reading.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Say 'Alexa, open Bible Reading' to start. Then ask for today's reading or a specific date.
